storage.title: Storage Settings
storage.name: Storage method
storage.tips_line_1: 1. When using object storage, you need to transfer the resource files in the public directory to the object storage space with the original directory path.
storage.tips_line_2: 2. Do not switch storage methods at will, as it may cause the image to be unavailable.
storage.tips_line_3: 3. You need to set the domain name cross-domain in the object storage background, otherwise the image generation scene cannot be used, such as poster synthesis, etc.
storage.tips_line_4: 4. You need to add the image domain name of the object storage to the WeChat applet official background request legal domain name and downloadFile legal domain name.

system.title: System maintenance
system.title_tips: Tips: Data generated during the operation of the system
system.content_cache_desc: Various cache data generated during system operation
system.content_data_desc: Various data generated during system use
system.tips_confirm_clear_cache: Confirm to clear the system cache
system.tips_confirm_clear_data: Confirm to clear the system data
system.tips_confirm_clear_data_no: Please select the type of data to clean first
system.clear_data_type_dept: Organization management clear (organization management module, employee management module {keep the basic admin login account})
system.clear_data_type_staff: Employee management clear {keep the basic admin login account} (dormitory resident details)
system.clear_data_type_apartment: Dormitory management clear (building management, room, dormitory resident details)
system.clear_data_type_user_base: Members and member data clear (membership management module, financial management module {table number management reserved}, member points, game data module, profit and loss report module)
system.clear_data_type_user_data: Member data clear (financial management module {table number management reserved}, member points, game data module, profit and loss report module)
system.clear_data_type_game_config: Games and game data clear (game management module {point code configuration reserved}, game data module, profit and loss report module, table number management)
system.clear_data_type_game_data: Clear game data (game data module, profit and loss report module)
system.clear_data_type_table_config: Clear station number management (station number management, game data module, profit and loss report module)
system.clear_data_type_currency_config: Clear currency settings (currency settings module, game management module, game data module, profit and loss report module, financial management module, external management module, member management module)

website.title: Website Information
website.field_check_web_favicon_type: The icon format only supports ico
website.field_check_login_image: Please select the login page advertisement image
website.tips_web_logo: Recommended size: 256*256 pixels, support jpg, jpeg, png format
website.tips_web_favicon: Mandatory size: 256*256 pixels, support ico format
website.tips_login_image: Recommended size: 1920*1080 pixels, support jpg, jpeg, png format
